statements: SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'motion_detected';
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Front Door';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, duration FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'intrusion';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT id, location, event_type, duration FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE event_type = 'break-in' AND location LIKE '%Entrance%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_camera_footage WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(id) AS total_events FROM security_camera_footage GROUP BY camera_id HAVING total_events > 10;
SELECT location, event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' GROUP BY location, event_type ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_metadata;
SELECT camera_id, footage_location, recording_start, recording_end FROM security_camera_metadata;
SELECT camera_id, footage_location, recording_start, recording_end FROM security_camera_metadata WHERE camera_id = 'abc123';
SELECT search_id, camera_id, search_timestamp FROM search_history;
SELECT search_id, search_timestamp FROM search_history ORDER BY search_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_metadata WHERE footage_location LIKE '%Entrance%' ORDER BY recording_start DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS search_count FROM search_history GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY search_count DESC
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS search_count FROM search_history WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM search_timestamp) = 3 GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY search_count DESC
SELECT camera_id, recording_start, recording_end FROM security_camera_metadata WHERE recording_start BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY recording_start ASC
SELECT search_id, search_timestamp FROM search_history WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY search_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT camera_location, recorded_date FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, action_type, timestamp FROM security_camera_log WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT camera_id, footage_path FROM security_camera_footage ORDER BY recorded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY recorded_date DESC;
SELECT camera_location, footage_path FROM security_camera_footage WHERE recorded_date >= '2021-05-01';
SELECT DISTINCT camera_location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE footage_path LIKE '%/recordings%';
SELECT camera_location, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage f JOIN security_camera_log l ON f.camera_id = l.camera_id WHERE l.action_type = 'delete' ORDER BY f.recorded_date ASC, l.timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, l.action_type FROM security_camera_log l JOIN security_camera_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'admin' AND l.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Entrance'
SELECT camera_id, location, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, camera_id, status FROM camera_status WHERE status = 'Offline' ORDER BY last_checked DESC
SELECT camera_id, alert_type, alert_time FROM camera_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Motion Detected'
SELECT camera_id, latitude, longitude FROM camera_location
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, camera_id, location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT camera_id, count(*) AS num_alerts FROM camera_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'motion_detected' GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY num_alerts DESC;

SELECT sl.camera_id, cl.latitude, cl.longitude, cs.status FROM security_camera_footage sl LEFT JOIN camera_location cl ON sl.camera_id = cl.camera_id LEFT JOIN camera_status cs ON cl.camera_id = cs.camera_id WHERE cs.status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, MAX(alert_time) AS last_alert_time FROM camera_alerts GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY last_alert_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM CameraEventTypes WHERE event_type_id = 1;
SELECT camera_id, location_description FROM CameraLocation WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, access_timestamp, activity_description FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY access_timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_id, location, timestamp FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata WHERE event_type='motion'
SELECT * FROM CameraLocation WHERE camera_id=1
SELECT event_description FROM CameraEventTypes WHERE event_type_id=2
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserAccessPermissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_timestamp, activity_description FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC
